text: "Christmas Time (Is Here Again)" is a 1967 song by The Beatles and was originally recorded for their fifth fan club album. Following its December 1967, it remained largely forgotten until its B-side release from their 1995 B-side release of Free as a Bird. The 1967 version was re-issued on The Christmas Records, a 2017 limited-edition box set of the band's original Christmas records. Category:The Beatles songs Category:1967 songs Category:1995 songs Category:Christmas songs
title: Christmas Time (Is Here Again)
